subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
Before I drop this, enquiring minds want to know:

Do you presently record EVP or ITC Al?

Have you ever?

If you have, what were you results?

Lastly... "Legitimate researchers"? What makes them legitimate?

w.
On Aug 18, 2008, at 10:11 AM, threadsintyme@... wrote:

> I don't know from whence you get your ideas from, but they are  
> ludicrous. To believe in sitting over a radio listening to radio  
> fragments and then joyously clapping their hands when a "researcher"  
> believes (usually this is just the "researcher" placing their own  
> beliefs into whatever they think that they hear) over thousands of  
> hours and years of research by mediums and other legitimate  
> researchers is inconceivable.
